definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Did anybody notice this year's Emmy's was the gayest award show ever?
sentences.chinese: 就沒人覺得這屆艾美獎是史上最基情四射的一屆嗎？

sentences.english: In the show’s first season, one of Haggis’s scripts won an Emmy.
sentences.chinese: 在這個節目的第一季，哈吉斯的一個腳本贏了艾美獎。

sentences.english: The drama won an Emmy for Best Show.
sentences.chinese: 這部戲劇贏得艾美獎的最佳節目獎。

sentences.english: The author is an Emmy Award-winning TV former news correspondent.
sentences.chinese: 作者是獲得過艾美獎的前新聞記者。

sentences.english: The 59th Primetime Emmy Awards will air Sept. 16.
sentences.chinese: 第59屆艾美獎將於9月16日播放。

sentences.english: But on the whole, comedy was king at the 55th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，喜劇是今年五十五屆年度艾美獎的主宰。

sentences.english: It has won 58 awards, including Golden Globes and Emmys.
sentences.chinese: 榮獲過58個獎項，其中包括金球獎和艾美獎。

sentences.english: Last year’s Emmy awards were dominated by cable shows.
sentences.chinese: 去年的艾美獎被授予了有線頻道的電視節目。

sentences.english: Founded by Emmy winner Byron Vaughns.
sentences.chinese: 公司由艾美獎得主拜倫沃恩斯。

sentences.english: She was Emmy-nominated for her work as Velma.
sentences.chinese: 爲維爾瑪出色的配音使她榮獲艾美獎提名。

sentences.english: The Emmys, the television industry's top awards ceremony has taken place in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 電視產業的頂級獎項的頒獎典禮艾美獎在洛杉磯舉行。

sentences.english: The Emmys usually rotate among the four major broadcast networks.
sentences.chinese: 艾美獎有美國四大廣播電視網輪流做東舉辦。

sentences.english: Emmy-award winning actress Glenn Close produced the piece.
sentences.chinese: 艾美獎獲獎的女演員格倫克洛斯產生的作品。

definition: Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 格萊美獎|格莱美奖

pinyin: ping2 shen3 tuan2 te4 bie2 jiang3

definition: Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 葛萊美獎|葛莱美奖

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Wen2 hua4 Xie2 hui4

definition: Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 He2 ping2 jiang3

definition: General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
